attributes.action: DADS are just as important as MUMS
attributes.additional_details:
I want Fathers rights taken into account when they make adverts regarding children as I'm disgusted that SMA milk seem to only care about mums and completely disregard the Fathers this needs to be correct as I feel this breaches my rights as a father.

I feel the government should make it more equal as soon as possible and show fathers Britain does care.
